thread.section_title: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski | eriksbikeshop.com | 3 of 53
thread.title: Lesley
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Lesley

author: Lesley
title: Lesley
text: At first the service I received was great. There was an issue with my order due to an error on the website and they were quick to let me know and let me choose an alternate item that was more money than the original item without charging me a difference. However when I wanted to return an item I received not one response after three emails sent. Good service only comes when your spending money, not when you're trying to get it back.
